title: Pasadena, California
summary: Pasadena (/ˌpæsəˈdiːnə/ PAS-ə-DEE-nə; Spanish: [pasaˈðena]) is a city in Los Angeles County, California, 11 miles (18 km) northeast of downtown Los Angeles. It is the most populous city and the primary cultural center of the San Gabriel Valley.[17] With its substantial downtown area, observers consider it as either a suburb of nearby Los Angeles, or as a significant urban center in its own right.[18][19]
